Posts.Content: lostfloridian wrote: I think I saw a dating thread on the boards, but I don't think it was for stage 4.  I've been divorced for 7 years, and  now find myself desiring a relationship (is this ludicrous or what?)  any way, how do you bring up the fact that your life span may be considerably shorter than most people would ever go for, as far as a relationship goes, and also that you don't have breasts just now (my reconstruction is in February)?  I would genuinely like to have a legitimate relationship with a man, but don't know if it would be fair to him.  Any feedback? robin walsh Dx 7/8/2009, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IV, Grade 3, 3/16 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: dating and new relationships lostfloridian tracy603
